body.name: EATOP 256GB Photo Stick for iPhone Flash Drive, iPhone Memory Stick Thumb Drives USB Stick External Storage Compatible with iPhone/iPad/Android/PC (Red)

features: ✔【4 IN1 USB FLASH DRIVE】Compared with traditional single plug flash drive, iPhone flash drive has multiple plug models and supports devices such as Android(OTG function)/ iPhone/iPad/PC. Just use this compact flash drive and you can transfer photos and videos freely between multiple devices. (Note: For iPhone/iPad devices you need to download the APP "Y-Disk", you can search and download it through APP Store, For Android phones must have OTG function in order to use this flash drive)

✔【ONE-CLICK BACKUP】iPhone memory stick provides a simple and quick way to transfer photos and videos. Just plug the usb flash drive into moblie phone, install and open "Y-DISK" app, and you can easily backup all photos, videos and files with one click. No need for tedious selection, copying and pasting. Save your time and memory space with a thumb drive! Note: Android phones do not need to download the app "Y-DISK", they only need to have OTG function to connect directly to the Android phones.

✔【HIGH-SPEED TRANSFERS WITH USB 3.0】Directly plugs into your mobile phone port and USB 3.0 port, experience up to 80 MB/s reading and 30 MB/s writing speed with USB port. Enjoy the whole relaxing trip with never stuttering or buffering video play on the go. Support videos formats: AVI, M4V, MKV, MOV, M P4, MPG, RM, RMVB, TS, WMV, FLV, 3GP; AUDIOS: FLAC, APE, AAC, AIF, M4A, MP3, WAV.

✔【PRIORITY TO PRIVACY PROTECTION】You can use this iphone photo stick to share files, photos and videos with colleagues and friends without worrying about personal privacy leaks. Because our iPhone thumb drive has file encryption function. You can choose to encrypt some files with Touch ID or a password, or you can choose to encrypt all files. The encrypted files will not be displayed on the computer, which will provide you with a more convenient and safer use experience.

✔【FREE UP YOUR MEMORY SPACE】Still get annoyed with the short-storage of mobile phone? You will no more have that bad feeling with our 256G flash drive! Store your favorite movies, music & images to our Memory Photo Stick for iPhone and iPad, and enjoy them when you are on a trip or trave. Or you can capture wonderful moments in life and save them into this iPhone photo storage device, and then upload them on your social media to share the joy with family and friends!

productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 5,506 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: • If you feel the font of the instruction manual is too small to be seen, please con-tact us for a PDF version. Do you want to make your Phone more convenient? Are you tired of your Phone running out of memory? Do you want to keep enough Phone memory during your trip? Never lose important documents, videos, photos again thanks to large and reliable iPhone flash drives. One-Click Backup You can easily backup with one click and manage files at any time. No need of iTunes, manage files, phone address book, pictures and videos through the mobile app to quickly backup to iPhone flash drive, save the storage space of the mobile phone, and at the same time, operations such as forwarding files on the usb drive can be performed. Plug and Play Share your photos, videos, songs and other files between iPhone picture stick easily. You don't have to pay extra for additional storage, just insert iPhone external storage and enjoy the extra space of your flash drive. Protect File Privacy The General Password & Touch ID can encrypt file information in APP to protect your private files and prevent theft. Media Formats Supported Music: M4A / AIFF / CAF / MP3 / WAV Image: GIF / JPG / PNG / JPEG Video: AVI / FLV / M4V / MKV / MOV / MP4 / RMVB Document: DOC / PPT / XLS / XLSX / PDF / HTML / TX

REMARKS 1. Flash drive for iPhone/iPad needs to download app ''Y-DISK'', you can search the app from the App Store. (When the phone does not recognize the usb stick, please uninstall the "Y-DISK" APP, then restart the phone and manually download the "Y-DISK" APP from the APP Store) 2. If you've used iCloud before to back up your files, you'll need to download the files from iCloud to your Phone or Pad and then copy them to usb flash drive. 3. For Android phones must have OTG function in order to use this flash drive, no need to download APP 4. Only support Android phones with OTG function. You can find the external usb storage in the "File Manager" APP of your phone. (NO NEED TO DOWNLOAD APP) * If your phone doesn't work, you need to open the phone set to open the OTG connection. PLEASE NOTE * You cannot transfer or view media files downloaded from iTunes or other third-party applications. Because these files are protected by digital rights management. * If necessary, please remove your phone case before use. Because the phone case will affect the connection between the phone and the usb flash drive. Even if you insert the usb drive into the phone, the usb drive may not be recognized by the phone. * The FAT32 format is usually suitable for small-capacity iphone flash drive and has better compatibility; if it is a large-capacity USB flash drive, the preferred format is recommended as: EXFAT>FAT32. If flash drive for iPhone cannot transfer files, you can convert FAT32 to EXFAT format by formatting. (Please save the file before formatting to prevent data loss) * After using the iPhone photo stick, please make sure to turn off the apps related to the iPhone flash drive, and then unplug the usb flash drive gently, so that the files in the usb flash drive will not be damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It may not fit with some phone cases.
reviews.reviewText: This is amazing to backup photos, videos and contacts. You download a free app from the App Store that is very easy to use. You can plug it up to a computer to organize and copy your files. It is also fairly priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you're someone who's always on-the-go and needs a reliable storage solution for your iPhone, then the EATOP USB flash drive is definitely worth checking out. I recently purchased the 1TB memory stick and I have to say, I am thoroughly impressed with its performance.Firstly, the design of the memory stick is sleek and compact, making it easy to carry around with you wherever you go. It also has a lightning connector which makes it really convenient to connect to your iPhone without having to use any external cables.In terms of storage capacity, the 1TB option offers plenty of space for all of my files, photos and videos, which is great considering how much I tend to use my phone for work and personal projects.But what really sets this memory stick apart from others on the market is its speed. The transfer speeds are incredibly fast, meaning I can easily back up or move large files in a matter of seconds.Another great feature of the EATOP USB flash drive is its compatibility with a wide range of devices. Not only can it be used with iPhones, but it can also be connected to iPads, computers and other devices with ease.Overall, I would highly recommend the EATOP USB flash drive 1TB memory stick for anyone looking for a reliable and high-performing storage solution for their iPhone. Its sleek design, fast transfer speeds and compatibility with a wide range of devices make it a top choice in its category.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product but the app is weak
reviews.reviewText: Great compact design and great ease of use between an iphone and a PC. I just wish the app was working properly. I sometimes have to format the key again so that the app actually transfers the photos instead of just pretending.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the easy set up and convenients of being able to back up all my photos and store them on my hard drive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good little unit
reviews.reviewText: This device works pretty good for most of the things I use it for, but as stated by others, the iPhone plug does not play nice with most cases, but I bought a little extender for a few bucks and it works nicely together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very convenient, with connectors for all types of phones and tablets.
reviews.reviewText: I liked the ability to connect to all the devices I own. Good transfer speeds and easy to use the adaptors that come in a convenient storage box. I recommend this product for anyone seeking a good storage drive. Closes for transport to protect the connecters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Type C Does NOT work! The Lightning DOES work!
reviews.reviewText: I have an iPad Generation 3 that uses the type C connector. I plugged the flash drive into the iPad. I was immediately asked to download the Y Disk app. So the iPad recognized the flash drive but the Y Disk software would not respond. It kept asking me to insert the flash drive. The drive was inserted and seated but not recognized.I have an older iPad 2 that uses the Lightning connector. The Eatop flash drive works perfectly along with the Y Disk software. I can offload videos and save them to a large external hard drive on my computer.I would not recommend using the flash drive for permanent storage. #1 the amount of space on my 1TB drive is very limited. Even though it is supposed to be 1 TB. #2 Other reviewers had stated that files mysteriously disappear. You do not want your files or photos to be lost permanently.Again, the flash drive lightning connector works. It does look like the USB port is not that sturdy. After one day the upper covering flipped up. I pushed it back down and continued using it. Another user noted the same issue with the USB port.I

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars overall ok product
reviews.reviewText: Overall it’s an ok product. it’s simple to use and transfers pretty quickly. what i don’t like about it is you have to download an app and it basically downloads your photos that you already have on your phone onto the app. so now i have two apps with the same photos until i delete the photos. i just wanted to automatically download the photos to the external. but i’ll keep using it.
Me fué muy útil el artículo en el iPhone 12, pero no así en el 6S, no lo reconoce. Y me interesaba más para el 6S.
J'adore je fais du vidéo avec mon iphone et je facilement et rapidement transférer des documents et vidéos.

Habe im Juni 23 diesen EATOP USB-Flash-Laufwerk 1 TB bei Amazon erstanden. Bei 99,3 GB war Schluß, mehr geht nicht drauf. Er tut zwar so, die Datein erscheinen, aber der Inhalt 0 KB.Mein Fazit, wer keinen Daten verlust erleiden möchte, Hände weg!Und noch was, Händlergarantie ist bei Amazon offenbar ein Fremdwort.
Good product.May be due to the increased demand,Price increased by about 10%
